title: I want refund my skin and character
body:
I buied character and skin for RP..so can you refund..? lee sin, lee sin skin(knockout lee sin), graves and for IP nunu, Tristana and Amumu.
plz refund for this

replies.body:
Hi Jytank,

You actually get 3 refund tokens when you start playing. [Here are instructions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ) on how to use them. Make sure you really don't want them before you refund them, you can don't do 3 refunds in the lifetime of the account.
you have refunds on your account. just go to your purchase history.
